section.heading: Action by interested parties.
section.text: Interested parties shall have 30 days after the mailing or publication of the notice under ยง 42-3173.05, whichever is later, to take sufficient action.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Apr. 19, 2002, D.C. Law 14-114, ยง 102, 49 DCR 1468

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 42-3173.07.
